function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of overadjustment due to adjusting for prior healthcare costs and predisposing variables","Impact":"Inflated or misleading results in the analysis, leading to incorrect conclusions","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analyses to assess the impact of overadjustment and consider excluding prior healthcare costs from the analysis","Technologies":"Statistical modeling techniques, sensitivity analysis tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians, data analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"},{"Description":"Risk of biased results due to two-step modeling approach","Impact":"Biased estimates of costs and effects, leading to inaccurate predictions and policy decisions","Mitigation":"Validate the modeling approach with alternative methods, such as causal inference techniques, and assess the robustness of the results","Technologies":"Causal inference models, robustness checks, sensitivity analysis tools","People":"Research team, policy makers","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team"},{"Description":"Risk of misinterpreting categorical variables in the models","Impact":"Incorrect conclusions due to misinterpretation of categorical variable effects","Mitigation":"Provide clear definitions and interpretation guidelines for categorical variables, and use appropriate reference categories in the models","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, statistical software with clear variable definitions","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research team"}]}
